name: LOUISIANA, ex rel. Charles J. BALLAY, District Attorney for the Parish of Plaquemines, et al., petitioners, v. BP EXPLORATION & PRODUCTION, INC., et al.

opinions.text:
Petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Fifth Circuit denied.
Justice ALITOtook no part in the consideration or decision of this petition.
